title: Doing a sin while the athaan is going on, is this a sin in itself? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
Zainab from Pakistan I wanted to ask this 
question um I will not go in details but   if one is doing an act act that could 
be a sin and Athaan is happening at the   same time or one is listening to a meeting 
which is Islamic so is it a sin in itself the sin is a sin whether the Athaanis going on 
whether the Quran is being recited whether the   Sheikh is on YouTube giving a lecture 
this has nothing to do with your sin   now what doubles or triples the sin if it 
is accompanied by mocking and ridiculing   such rituals so a person is smoking that's sinful 
that then is being given and he continues to smoke   this has nothing to do with the Athaan and if someone says to him akhi the Athaan 
is being called and he says yes I'm repeating   behind the muazthin then he says yes but you're 
smoking he said this has nothing to do with Athaan   he said no you're mocking Islam said no I'm not 
mocking Islam I love Islam I love the Athaan   I don't intend any disrespect so 
again this is from shaytan it has   nothing to do with that or with 
these rituals and Allah Knows Best
